intro: The original naval strategy game sets sail once again – Hasbro's Battleship! Choose your Commander, deploy your ships and sink the enemy fleet. Ready, aim, FIRE!
description:
Enter the arena and prepare to face your foe in Hasbro’s Battleship, the official and most faithful digital adaptation of the classic board game on Nintendo Switch™.

Position your ships and face your enemy across a vast ocean. Success depends on how well you can read your opponent and the accuracy of your deductions. Choose your coordinates, launch your missiles and sink their fleet! It’s the two-player head-to-head combat game that’s different every time you play.

With the base game, you’ll unlock three arenas to play in: Montevideo, Maunsell Forts and Fort St. Angelo.

You’ll also get three playable Commanders: William Karslake, Johannes Schmidt and Giuseppe Ferrara! Use them across all game modes, including the brand-new Commanders Mode, where each will come equipped with a unique ability – William Karslake can order a devastating Airstrike, Johannes Schmidt launches a destructive Torpedo and Giuseppe Ferrara can unleash a Bombardment upon his opponent! 

HOW TO PLAY BATTLESHIP: 
1. Decide where you want to place your ships on your grid.
2. Take turns to call out a coordinate on the grid – this is where you’ll launch your missiles.
3. If you correctly deduce the coordinate of one of your opponent’s ships, they’ll say “Hit!” If not, they’ll say “Miss!” 
4. Once you’ve hit all the spaces a ship occupies, the ship sinks – “You sank my battleship!” 
5. Sink all your opponent’s ships first to win!

FEATURES
- THE OFFICIAL BATTLESHIP GAME – There’s no better way to play your favourite tactical board game on Nintendo Switch.
- MULTIPLE MODES – Set sail in multiple ways. Play against expert AI opponents in Single Player, test your tactics against the world in Online Mode or challenge your friends in Play with Friends Mode.
- EARN MEDALS – Complete fun in-game missions to earn medals!
- NEW COMMANDERS MODE – A new, more tactical variation of the game! Pick from a variety of Commanders, each with unique abilities and ship shapes.

Join your friends online and sink their fleet before they sink yours – play Hasbro’s Battleship today!
